50.eng-name: The Book of Seeking Refuge with Allah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Sa'eed, from Abu Hurairah who said:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] said: 'Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min 'ilmin la yanfa'u, wa min qalbin la yakhsha'u, wa min nafsin la tashba'u, wa min du'a'in la yusma' (O Allah, I seek refuge with You from knowledge that is of no benefit, a heart that is not humble, a soul that is not satisfied and a supplication that is not heard)

chapter.ara-name: باب الاِسْتِعَاذَةِ مِنْ دُعَاءٍ لاَ يُسْمَعُ
chapter.eng-name: Seeking Refuge from a Supplication that is Not Heard
